questions.question_text: During the Discovery phase of a Sales Cloud implementation, which three steps should a consultant complete to prepare for a successful engagement? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: DE
its says pick 2. this is a discovery phase

questions.question_text:
Cloud Kicks has requested a Statement of Work (SOW) that clearly states who will train users on new features and how the training will be delivered.

Which two sections of a SOW should the consultant discuss further with Cloud Kicks to meet the requirement? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BC
The Approach section outlines how the project will be executed, including the methodology and delivery methods. It is the appropriate place to specify how training will be delivered, such as in-person sessions, webinars, or e-learning modules.

The Scope section defines what is included and excluded in the project. It should detail the responsibility for training, the number of users to be trained, and which features will be covered.
B & C is the correct answer
Sorry, C is out as the question says "discuss further ".

I think A, B & C are correct.
https://trailhead.salesforce.com/content/learn/modules/sow-best-practices/build-a-sow

Selected Answer: D
D is it

Selected Answer: D
D should be it

Selected Answer: D
the most important step for Cloud Kicks to take to ensure that Opportunities are associated with the relevant marketing Campaign. The Primary Campaign Source field is used to track the Campaign that was most influential in closing the Opportunity. By validating that this field is populated, Cloud Kicks can ensure that it is accurately tracking its marketing ROI.
Would D be the more appropriate answer?

choices.C: Ensure the Type field on Opportunities reflects the Campaign source.
choices.D: Validate that the Primary Campaign Source field on Opportunity records is populated.
choices.A: Ensure the Opportunity is associated with an Account record.
choices.B: Leverage the Probability(%) field on Opportunities to forecast revenue.

questions.question_text:
Cloud Kicks (CK) wants to ensure Opportunities are associated with the relevant marketing Campaign. In the past, CK has struggled to evaluate marketing Campaign ROI.

Which process improvement should the consultant recommend?

choices.B: Review the current system with IT management to understand their requirements.
choices.A: Review the current system with all levels of users to understand their requirements.
choices.C: Review the current system with executive management to understand their requirements.
choices.D: Review the current system and configure Sales Cloud to work in the same way.

questions.question_text:
Universal Containers is moving from a legacy customer relationship management (CRM) system to Salesforce Sales Cloud.
What should a consultant recommend to ensure a successful implementation?

discussion.content:

questions.question_text:
Cloud Kicks operates in multiple countries and wants to track historical exchange rates. The Consultant at CK has implemented dated exchange rates by using advanced currency management.

How is the converted currency amount on Opportunities calculated?

discussion.content: A is correct: Converted currency amounts on opportunities display based on the specified Close Date, regardless of the opportunity stage https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=sf.admin_enable_multicurrency_implications.htm&type=5

choices.A: The close date regardless of the opportunity stage
choices.C: The close date only when the stage is closed
choices.B: The current exchange rate regardless of the close date
choices.D: The exchange rate at the time the opportunity is closed
